content: I think I saw mention of a pregnancy/maternity/birth care implementation guide once, but can't find where. Is there any effort underway or planned to consolidate the many useful but scattered tips on this topic? I'll be working on this in the Netherlands, and would love to learn and share.
Australia and UK. The Australian one is at https://build.fhir.org/ig/hl7au/au-fhir-childhealth
@Grahame Grieve Thanks. Certainly looks useful.
